[b]*** IMPORTANT MESSAGE ***[/b]

You have automatically received a warning due to bad ratio.
You now have 5 days to improve your ratio.
If your ratio still is below 0.5 after {0} days your account will be disabled, otherwise the warning will be removed.

* A private torrent site require its users to seed everything they download for a longer period of time.
* Ask a friend to spend his/her bonus points to improve your ratio.
* You can make a donation to {1} which will also improve your ratio. [url=/donate]Donera[/url]

Good luck!
